reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 150/95: CRITERIA - POWER OF SALE
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 150/95: CRITERIA - POWER OF SALE
reg_info.act_under: planning act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. No approval shall be given by a council under subsection 50 (18) of the Act unless the approval conforms with, (a) any official plan in effect in the municipality; (b) the zoning by-law of the municipality, if any; and (c) any Minister’s zoning order under clause 47 (1) (a) of the Act.  O. Reg. 150/95, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. No approval shall be given by a council under subsection 50 (18) of the Act unless the approval conforms with,

(a) any official plan in effect in the municipality;

(b) the zoning by-law of the municipality, if any; and

(c) any Minister’s zoning order under clause 47 (1) (a) of the Act.  O. Reg. 150/95, s. 1.

content.content: 2. This Regulation does not apply to any application for approval under subsection 50 (18) of the Act made to a council before March 28, 1995.  O. Reg. 150/95, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. This Regulation does not apply to any application for approval under subsection 50 (18) of the Act made to a council before March 28, 1995.  O. Reg. 150/95, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (revokes other Regulations and provides for transition).  O. Reg. 150/95, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (revokes other Regulations and provides for transition).  O. Reg. 150/95, s. 3.

content.content: 4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 150/95, s. 4. Note:  Despite the revocation of Ontario Regulation 847/93, any application for approval under subsection 50 (18) of the Act made to a council before March 28, 1995 shall be continued and dealt with under the Regulation as if it had not been revoked.  See:  O. Reg. 150/95, s. 3 (2).
content.raw_html:
4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 150/95, s. 4.

Note:  Despite the revocation of Ontario Regulation 847/93, any application for approval under subsection 50 (18) of the Act made to a council before March 28, 1995 shall be continued and dealt with under the Regulation as if it had not been revoked.  See:  O. Reg. 150/95, s. 3 (2).
